name: audiobook-app
description: This is a separate project for the mobile audiobook app.

scripts.setup: npm run prepare-www && npm run add-platform
scripts.prepare-www: mkdir -p www && cp index.html style.css app.js manifest.json sw.js mudrosti-db.js desktop-features.js www/ && cp -r assets www/
scripts.add-platform: npx cap add android || echo 'Android platform already exists' && npx cap sync
scripts.build:android: npx cap sync && npx cap open android
